Name: Sniper 3D Assassin: Free to Play
About the game: Sniper 3D Assassin® in 7 words: great gameplay, awesome visuals and entertaining missions. Hundreds of challenging missions Play in over 850+ thrilling missions and 13 different worlds as you dive in this addictive game Develop your sniper skills Embark on real world operations when shooting under rain, wind and fog. Try to hit moving targets from unstable platforms Tons of customizable weapons Make sure you explore your arsenal's full potential by customizing over 150+ snipers and rifles Become an owner now Download now for free and have access to frequent updates and new game content periodically Sniper 3D Assassin® is brought to you by Fun Games For Free
